1.1.name: wordpress/order-posts-by-word-count
1.1.description:
The Order Posts by Word Count plugin creates a widget that lists posts in order by word count. Posts can be sorted in ascending or descending order and you can select how many posts you want to show. The widget can be used in the sidebar or any widgetized area.

The widget uses your existing CSS rules to adapt to the look and feel of your site. If the widget does not look quite right, your existing CSS files will likely need tweaking. You can visit the plugin homepage for questions regarding this plugin.
